name: Speed Racer
description: Speed Racer is an arcade-style racing game based on the television show, originally released shortly before the 1997 series revival. The driver has a choice between three versions of the Mach V: Manual, Automatic, or Super. The racer also has a choice between three versions of the racetrack: small, medium, and large. The Mach V has various features equipped on the car in order to gain an advantage on the opponent, including buzz saws and flamethrowers.
